mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM alarm_statistics alarm JOIN alarm_task_description atd ON atd.function_name = alarm.function_name JOIN device d ON d.id = alarm.device_code JOIN pump_house dl ON dl.id = d.id_pump_house WHERE d.id IN ( SELECT authobject_id FROM permission_info WHERE role_id IN (SELECT role_id FROM sys_user_role WHERE user_id = #{userId}) or role_id in (select role_id as authobject_id from sys_office_role_new where office_id in (select office_id from sys_user where id = #{userId})) GROUP BY authobject_id ) and (start_date > substring(now(),1,10) or end_date > substring(now(),1,10)) and alarm_status = '1' and confirm_status = '0'
